title: Substitution in Function
text: How can we substitute 1 into the equation? We can replace x with 1 in the given function expression.

title: Taking the Cube Root.
text: The cube root of a negative number is negative.

title: Taking the Cube Root.
text: What is $$\sqrt[3]{-1}$$, what can be multiplied by itself 3 times to get -1? $$\left(-1\right) \left(-1\right) \left(-1\right)=-1$$, so $$\sqrt[3]{-1}=-1$$. Therefore $$f(1)=-1$$.
